author: dblevins
msg: Added HomeHandle support back into the interface.

author: dblevins
msg: [Fix #15][transaction]
TransactionPolicy.  Heavy amounts of logging added.  These logging
statements use to org.openejb.util.Loggers, one for the OpenEJB category
and one for a new Transaction category.

author: dblevins
msg: [Fix #12][entity]
EntityContainer.  Several fixes to the use of pooling, this also fixes the
load/store problems.
[Fix #14][entity]
EntityInstanceManager.  Performance fixes. Instead of keeping pools of
simple objects, we discard the objects and create them again.  JDK 1.3 and
higher are better at reusing instances.

author: dblevins
msg: [Fix #07][intravm]
BaseEjbProxyHandler.  IntraVm copy flag can now be switched on and off on a
per handle basis.  The equals, hashCode, and toString methods have been
implemented.  [Task] The logging statement uses log4j directly, it should
be updated to use the logging interface instead.
[Fix #08][intravm]
EjbObjectProxyHandler.  Added optimization for checking which method to
invoke.  I was calling equals on strings before, but now keeps a hasmap of
the methods, each using an integer constant for the equals instead of a
string. Lots of logging was also added.  [Task] The logging statement uses
log4j directly, it should be updated to use the logging interface instead.
[Fix #09][intravm]
EjbHomeProxyHandler.  Added same optimizations for checking which method
to invoke.
[Fix #10][intravm]
IntraVmArtifact.  Replaced the previous caching hashmap with an array list.
This clears up the need to use strings as ids and fixes a bug where the
same item apprears in the list more than once.  Very clever fix.
[Fix #11][intravm]
IntraVmHandle.  Added back in the home handle support.
[Fix #12][intravm]
IntraVmServer.  Added back in the home handle support.

author: dblevins
msg: [Fix #06][transaction]
CoreUserTransaction.  Logs of great logging statements were added.
[Task] The logging statement uses log4j directly, it should be updated to
use the logging interface instead.
